## Task 1
```{r}
x = runif(100, 20, 70)
y = 5 + 3*x + 2*rnorm(100)
My_data = data.frame(x,y)
plot(My_data)

LL_line = function(params){
  params = c(m,b,sigma)
  sum(log(dnorm(y - (m * x + b), sd = sigma)))
}

params1 = c(3,5,2)
testA = LL_line(params1)
print(testA)
params2 = c(4,1,10)
testB= LL_line(params2)
print(testB)

starting_params <- c(4, 1, 10)
best <- optim(starting_params, LL_line, control = list(fnscale = -1))
```
